Content.Text:
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well if it isn't <MYNAME>. Good morning.
Your smile is as beautiful as ever.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning there, <MYNAME>. When you get
old like me, mornings are rough.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. It looks like
you're having a busy morning.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. How's it going? I'm
just having another lazy day.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's it going there, <MYNAME>? Is there
anything interesting going on around
town?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS><MYNAME>, I get the sense that something
is going to happen around you soon.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Just kidding. Did my serious expression
worry you? Ha ha ha.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello there, <MYNAME>. I wonder if you
running around like that means something
new is coming to this town.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well good evening, <MYNAME>. It's late,
so you should get to sleep.
<PAGE>
What? Me? I'm fine. I'm not a kid
anymore.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening <MYNAME>. What are you
doing up this late? Well, I am impressed
with how you greet your elders.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, good evening there. Night time is
for adults. You're still too young to be
out and about at this hour.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, there <MYNAME>. You're
looking cheerful this morning. I, on the
other hand, am a sleepy old man.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well good morning, <MYNAME>. Seeing you
really wakes me up. Hey, don't get
angry. It's supposed to be a compliment.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning. I'm glad to see that
you're looking cheerful. How about a pat
on the head?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. Do you think there
could be something more between us?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>...Never mind. I shouldn't have asked.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello there, <MYNAME>. There's something
wholesome about meeting at noon.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. I'm doing really
well right now. I always feel this way
when I see you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>. What are you doing up at
this hour? Do you need something?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well if it isn't <MYNAME>. I don't think
you should be out walking this late.
You should listen to your elders.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Good evening there <MYNAME>. I'm happy
that you came to see me, but...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You need to think about the time. Do you
want me to walk you home?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Be careful at
work. I don't want you getting hurt or
anything.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. It's true what
they say that about marriage changing
your lifestyle.
<PAGE>
I've completely adapted to life on the
farm.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. It's funny, I used to hate
mornings when I was alone, but now that
I'm married, they're not so bad.
<PAGE>
I suppose it's all thanks to you, 
 <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey. What's going on, <MYNAME>? There's
nothing to report on my end.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so glad you finally talked to me. I
thought you were angry or something. I
was very worried.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look busy, <MYNAME>. I wasn't sure if
it would be good to talk to you while
you're so busy, so I kept to myself.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well <MYNAME>, I suppose we should be
getting to sleep soon.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Be careful <MYNAME>. I understand that
you're busy, but don't overdo it just
because you're young.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I used to work too hard when I was a
newspaper reporter, and I'm starting to
pay for it now.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you mad <MYNAME>? I'm asking because
you'd usually have come to talk to me by
now.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The weather's nice and warm today isn't
it <MYNAME>? It's going to make it easy
for me to fall asleep.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Rain, huh? I wonder why it is that
spring rain feels gentle.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It sure is hot today isn't it <MYNAME>?
I feel like I'm getting cooked. I wish I
could do something about this.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>. Rain is nice around this
time of year isn't it? It alleviates the
summer heat.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. Looking at the fall
sky is refreshing isn't it? I feel good
today.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ugh, I'm so depressed. All this rain
that's been falling is really dragging
me down.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hi <MYNAME>...it's...it's cold...huh?
Wh-what's the temperature right now?
A, achoo!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
N-not only is it cold, but it's also
cloudy. Th-this is no good. I'm
s-starting to feel f-faint.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This weather isn't normal. There's bound
to be some kind of damage afterward.
I should do some reporting then...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This is some snow storm. Snow doesn't
fall like this very often. I hope that
the town makes it through this okay.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>! Don't go outside! Typhoons are
something that we need to take very
seriously.
<PAGE>
A long time ago, I did some reporting on
an area that was hit by a typhoon. It
was terrible.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When enough snow collects on your roof,
it can crush your house. Snow is not
something that we should take lightly.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey there, <MYNAME>. Is it true that
you're in a relationship? That's
great. It's good to be young.
<PAGE>
You look so happy. I'm jealous. I think
I might want to get into a relationship
myself. Ha ha. Just kidding.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you get to be my age, this type of
scenery starts to become very important.
Do you know what I mean?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Heh. That's too bad. You won't
understand until you're an adult.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fancy meeting you here. Have you started
understanding the value of nature? This
town is great. It's simply the best.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I feel like fishing by the river. How
about it <MYNAME>? Do you want to go
fishing together?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is full of nature. It's an
important asset for the town. Of course,
that asset belongs to everyone.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Someone from the town told me that a
goddess appears in the spring at the top
of this mountain. Is that true?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>If it's true, I want to report on it.
It looks like you know something
<MYNAME>...Nah, how could you?
<PAGE>
Ha ha ha. Forget I mentioned it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This mountain air is great isn't it? I
love it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>When you get to be my age, it isn't easy
climbing all the way up here. But it was
worth it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farm work sounds simple, but it involves
a lot of different tasks. You seem to be
able to do it all, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I guess you're the real deal. I'm
impressed.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farms are so nice and peaceful. It makes
sense that milk and vegetables that come
from here would taste good.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A long time ago, I worked for a bit as
a miner in a big mine.
<PAGE>
I used to ride in a cart to get to the
places where I needed to dig. Yeah, that
was fun.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you're in a dark place like this,
you realize how important light is.
<PAGE>
What? You're asking me if it's scary?
No way. I'm an adult, so I'm fine.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The air is so fresh in a town that's
surrounded by nature. And the scenery in
the distance is so beautiful. I love it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In its own way, this town is livelier
than many, isn't it?
<PAGE>
But it's still just developing. I'm
excited to see what happens when more
people come.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is it just me, or has this town become a
lot livelier?
<PAGE>
I don't know what it was like in the
beginning, but at the very least, it
seems more lively than when I came here.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can you hear how the town is overflowing
with people's voices and the sounds of
their lives?
<PAGE>
It's a sign that more people have come
here and that it's become much livelier.
This town has truly become a great town.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there <MYNAME>. Got any scoops for
me? I could write a good article by
reporting on the changes in this town.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you fish, <MYNAME>? Fishing is fun.
When you're fishing, you can forget
about everything else.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is more interesting than other
towns. Other towns may have more stuff,
but they're boring.
<PAGE>
This town doesn't have much, but its
natural rhythms and its people are
interesting. That includes you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know little Tina? She's got that
spark. She's going to make a good
newspaper reporter.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm sure of it. There's no fooling these
eyes. What? You don't believe me?
<PAGE>
Hey, I'm a top reporter. You say I don't
look like one? Touché, <MYNAME>. Touché.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm taking a break from it now, but when
you're a newspaper reporter, it gets
harder to trust people.
<PAGE>
But the warmth of the people in this
town has really touched me. It makes me
want to try trusting people again.
<PAGE>
Ha ha. I'm just kidding about all that
stuff. It's fun teasing you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A long time ago, I was betrayed by a
fellow reporter. What can I say? I was
young at the time.
<PAGE>
I couldn't forgive that person then,
but after living in this town, I feel
like maybe I could forgive them now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Ha ha. Are you really taking this
seriously? Of course I'm just making
this up. You're so naive. Ha ha ha.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, nobody's as close to me as you
are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hm? You think I'm joking again?
<PAGE>
I'm not joking this time. I truly
believe it from the bottom of my heart.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you and I are supposed to be
going out right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>I mean, relationships are something that
you're supposed to put work into right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Maybe I'm just old-fashioned. Is this
how young people do it nowadays? I just
don't understand.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hello...<MYNAME>? Can you hear me?
<PAGE>
Okay. You can hear me. I've been talking
to you, but you've just been spacing
out.
<PAGE>
Am I boring you? I'm pretty confident
that my words don't usually bore people.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never thought I'd be going out with
you <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I mean, I'm just some old man, and
you're a beautiful young girl. There's
no way that we look like a couple.
<PAGE>
What? You disagree? Heh. Even if you're
just humoring me, it still feels good.
Thank you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Since we started going out, the
townspeople have been asking questions.
But it's not anything I can't handle.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What types of questions? I don't think
you really want to know. I'm sure you'd
get mad if I told you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think that recently, I've started
looking at people differently.
<PAGE>
I've been distrustful of other people
for a long time now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>But after coming to this town and being
with you, I've started feeling like
maybe I can trust people a little more.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Ha ha. Just kidding. Don't pay attention
to my nonsense.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
You want to know what I like about you
<MYNAME>? Why are you asking this all of
a sudden? Umm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm not very good at this kind of thing,
you know? What? You do know? Hey,
that's not very nice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But I guess what I like about you is how
you can make fun of me like that. Ha ha
ha.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
At this age, being around women isn't
particularly exciting. But it's
different when I'm with you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Every day, I feel like I'm reporting on
a big story. I'm excited all the time.
It's a funny feeling.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, you're making me sad.
<PAGE>
Just because you're so much younger than
me doesn't mean you should ignore me.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hello <MYNAME>? Please listen to me when
I talk to you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know <MYNAME>, you've changed since
we've gotten married.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>You used to look me in the eyes when you
talked to me, but now you almost always
look away.
<PAGE>
Are you mad about something? If you
are, please tell me what it is.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It may not look like it, but I'm very
grateful for the things that you do
<MYNAME>. I'm mostly talking about food.
<PAGE>
When I was by myself, I can't remember
ever eating anything good. That's just
what it's like being a single guy.
<PAGE>
But now that I'm married, I get to have
delicious food all the time. It really
makes a big difference.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm writing about life on the farm now.
Townspeople are very interested in what
it's like to live on a farm.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You don't believe it? You should know,
there are a lot of people in this world
who would like to try life on a farm.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Marriage is really wonderful. Every day,
I feel grateful that we're married.
<PAGE>
I mean, I've got such a cute wife, and
we get to work together.
<PAGE>
If I asked for anything more, my
newspaper buddies would punch me in the
face.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? What is it <MYNAME>? Why are you
staring at me like that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Wh, what? You really want me to say
that? It's so embarrassing. You know it
even if I don't say it right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>...I, I love...Ah! I can't say it! I
just can't. Please don't tease your
elders.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've never gone out with someone as
young as you, so I'm actually rather
confused.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I don't know what kids talk about these
days. But, I need to do my best and show
you what I can do. I won't let you down.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's ok. You don't need to be so
stiff. My time with you was a pleasant
dream <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Even though we've broken up, if you need
to talk about something, you can still
confide in me. Okay?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
We are going out right? This isn't just
some joke is it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>If you tell me that this is all some
kind of joke, I won't be surprised. It'd
actually make a lot of sense.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't believe I'm married to someone
who's so young. What will my newspaper
buddies say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I actually have a friend who got married
to a younger girl. I made fun of him a
lot. I'll probably get teased a lot too.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I came to this town to take a break from
work. I had no idea that I'd end up
living here and getting married.
<PAGE>
Life is unpredictable, isn't it
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Me, a father. It's still hard to
believe. I'm an adult, so I'm not going
to get all flustered about it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your stomach's gotten bigger, <MYNAME>.
I'm happy to see that the baby is
growing healthily.
<PAGE>
If you need anything, let me know. I'll
do whatever I can right away.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Th-the baby's going to be born soon?
Wh-what should I do?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>That's right. There was something
written about it in an article I had.
Ah! I threw it away when I moved!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What? W-what do you mean calm down?
I am calm.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Does <CHILD_NAME> hate me? Don't cry
when I hold you <CHILD_NAME>. I'm your
father.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We sure have raised a healthy child.
Recently, I let <CHILD_NAME> ride on my
back like I was a horse.
<PAGE>
It was fine until I tried to stop.
<CHILD_NAME> cried until I agreed to
keep playing. This kid is too energetic.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> sure has gotten big. Time
really does fly. I feel that way
whenever I look at that kid of ours.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> has gotten bigger but is
still a child on the inside, just like
someone else I know.
<PAGE>
Just kidding. But the way that kid of
ours is so straightforward does remind
me of you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, <ITEMNAME0>. It's so luxurious.
Is this for me <MYNAME>?
This is actually my favorite food.
<PAGE>
This is so good! Am I dreaming? I really
appreciate this <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is that for me? This is one of my
most favorite foods. You've made me very
happy.
<PAGE>
It's amazing that you can be so
considerate so naturally. I'm certain
that you'll go far, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, this is nice. Is this for me?
<PAGE>
This is one of my favorite foods. Thank
you <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You don't want this? Well, I can't
let it go to waste, so I'll take it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
This might be surprising coming from
someone my age, but I hate this. I'm
going to give it to someone else.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah. You've brought me...this. I've
always hated this. No matter how old I
get, I still can't eat it.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm not one to get angry easily, but how
dare you bring me <ITEMNAME0>!
<PAGE>
You know I hate eating this more than
anything else don't you? I can't stand
these types of pranks!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You grow things like this too? Your
dedication to research is impressive,
<MYNAME>. I should follow your example.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Wh-what is this? The size of this thing
is unbelievable. I smell a scoop.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What's come over you <MYNAME>? I can't
just take this. You should bring it back
home with you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You're making me sad. We're supposed to
be going out, aren't we? Instead of
giving presents, we need to be talking.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Anyways, I can't take this from you.
Here, take it back.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>? I think it's kind of rude to
just hand over a present even though you
almost never talk to me, 
<PAGE>
Anyways, I can't take this from you.
Here, take it back.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I could have sworn I just got a present.
Yeah, I did just get a present. That's
enough for today. I don't need this.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm really happy whenever I get a
present from you, <MYNAME>, but I can't
carry any more than what I already have.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I just got something from you, <MYNAME>.
If you're going to give me something,
please do it later.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, that's right. Today is my
birthday. I can't believe I'm another
year older. I think I'm going to cry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What?! <ITEMNAME0>?! You really know
what I like.
<PAGE>
Yum, this is so good! It's the perfect
birthday gift. Thank you <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, that's right. Today is my
birthday. I can't believe I'm another
year older. I think I'm going to cry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Whoa! This is a really good present!
Maybe birthdays aren't as bad as I
thought.
<PAGE>
Thank you <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, that's right. Today is my
birthday. I can't believe I'm another
year older. I think I'm going to cry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Is that a present? You've made this old
man happy. Thank you <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, that's right. Today is my
birthday. I can't believe I'm another
year older. I think I'm going to cry.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hm? Is that for me? Thank you. I'm going
to stop feeling sorry for myself now.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, that's right. Today is my
birthday. I can't believe I'm another
year older. I think I'm going to cry.
<PAGE>
I'm really grateful that you're trying
to make me feel better, but this present
just makes me feel worse.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, that's right. Today is my
birthday. I can't believe I'm another
year older. I think I'm going to cry.
<PAGE>
How could you give this to me, <MYNAME>?
I feel even worse than before.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, that's right. Today is my
birthday. I can't believe I'm another
year older. I think I'm going to cry.
<PAGE>

<PAGE>
And at the restaurant in this town, they
serve eel rice bowls in the summer.
I could eat eel rice bowls every day!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you're in my line of work, travel
agencies really come in handy.
<PAGE>
Especially Charles. He seems like the
kind of guy who would fly you anywhere
if something important happened.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't like sweets. I like cafés since
they're good for relaxing, but I hope
they don't mind if I just drink tea.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Moving is easy. I mean, all you have to
do is take your things and bring them
with you to a new place.
<PAGE>
But even that's become tiring for me
recently. I really am getting older.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The bigger the town, the more people,
and the more material for my articles.
Guess I'll be getting busy soon.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the whole town has a Western
style, it looks very orderly and
pleasant. But it's also kind of boring.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eastern style towns really make me feel
relaxed. They have atmosphere and style.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Being surrounded by this many exotic
buildings is a funny feeling isn't it?
<PAGE>
I like things that are a little
different, so I think the atmosphere of
this town suits me.
